```{r bnWhale-parent-section, echo=FALSE, results = "asis"}
###
# Generate a section for each dataset
###
childRmd <- here::here("reports/sections/isleMadame/isleMadame_en.rmd")
out <-  knitr::knit_expand(childRmd, imSection = "bnWhale", cols =  'c("OVERALL_PRESENCE","LIFE_STAGE", "RELATIVE_DISTRIBUTION", "RELATIVE_ABUNDANCE")', colnames = 'c("Overall Presence", "Lifestage", "Relative distribution", "Relative Abundance")')

res = knitr::knit_child(text = unlist(out), quiet = TRUE)
cat(res, sep = "\n")
```
